Text: This made my computer freeze after install, crack and reboot. Everything was drawn veeeeery slowly, and not even Task Manager would show up. I don't think it's a fake or anything, it's probably just some other software that collides. Maybe AVG Antivirus or BlackBox for Windows (shell). Anyways, just a warning; create a system restore point before install. I'm glad I did. ;)
